main.java.com.greendev.pragma.email
Class Emailer

java.lang.Object
  main.java.com.greendev.pragma.email.Emailer

public class Emailer
extends java.lang.Object

Sends an email with properties specified from {Email Properties} To send an email, construct the object and select from one of the two methods to send an email.

Author:
josediaz
